title: Weipa people
creator_credit: Jane Scragg, Edwin Scragg, Comalco and Scope Films
brief_description: A film about the largest bauxite mining operation in the world. Also looks at the social conditions of the people who have moved to this remote North Queensland town and the impact of the new town on local Aborigines. Commentary by Richard Oxenburgh.
